pr_title: SAMZA-2604: Datamodel change to capture physical container id for AM HA

timeline.message: Introduce config for cluster based job coordinator high availability
SAMZA-2604: Data model change to capture physical container id mapping for AM HA

timeline.bodyText: Can go inside the ifPresent block so that we don't create it unless it is available? Why this is optional by the way? Seems like this is required and we should bail out. unless its used in local flow where it isn't populated.
timeline.author: mynameborat
